dining: 15% to 20% is customary. Some restaurants include the gratuity in the bill, especially for large parties of six or more.
accommodation: Porters - 2 to 3 USD per bag. Housekeeping - 2 to 3 USD per night.

dining: It is not customary to tip in Japan; however, some western tourist areas will recommend a tip (it will be stated on the menu).
accommodation: Tips are not customary.

dining: A 10% service charge is usualy included in the bill. A few extra AED are appreciated for good service.

dining: 5% to 10% is customary.

dining: Gratuity is included in the bill.

dining: Gratuity is included in the bill. Add 5% to 10% for the server.
